price: Yɛansεe kuro bi gyesε (Yɛdi kan ma) wͻnya kͻkͻbͻfoͻ -
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
